new revenue." Wedbush's Lou Kerner said the new management structure could prove more nimble than the troika of Eric Schmidt , Page and Sergey Brin , which has been in place for the last decade. What I do think Facebook has shown Google is that they're moving too slow, Lou Kerner said. "Facebook is moving at the speed of light and Google isn't. "Having three people running the company, making the decisions, was slowing it down," he added.

" But in this week's Arts& Leisure section, Jon Caramanica argues that the Aerosmith frontman's wacky charisma has ably replaced Simon Cowell 's caustic derision as the show's signature quality.
